questions.question: What is the dominant color of the packaging's background?
What is the overall shape of the product's packaging?
What brand logo is prominently displayed on the packaging?
What material appears to constitute the product's packaging?
What type of printing is used for the text on the packaging?
Considering the packaging's features, what is its primary function?
What is the text's orientation relative to the packaging's longer side?
Describe the texture of the packaging's visible surface?
Are there any visible perforations or tear-off elements on the packaging?
What type of graphic elements are used besides text on the package?
What is the overall style or aesthetic of the packaging design?
Are there any apparent seams or folds visible on the packaging's surface?
What is the predominant finish of the packaging's outer layer?
Does the packaging include any apparent security features (seals, etc.)?
Excluding the logo, what language(s) are used on the packaging?
